en.welcome: Welcome to my Resume and Portfolio!
en.bio: As a beginner who has just entered the programming world, my greatest strengths are my passion and continuous knowledge acquisition. I hope we can work together to create amazing works!

zh.welcome: 歡迎!這是我的履歷與作品集！
zh.bio: 作為一個剛進入程式世界的初學者，充分的熱情與不斷汲取知識是我最大的優點，希望我們一起合作，創造出令人驚嘆的作品!
